name: HiRed: Non-Human Resources
description:
In HiRed, you have to hire monsters to work in your business, but you have to make sure your staff is diverse enough! Go through all the resumes handed to you and choose which monster you want to hire based on its origin, its gender and its age. Balance every stats to keep your job. Fail to do it, and you will be fired!

This game was made during Jam Nation's second game jam, in partnership with Unity.

The theme was: Diversity / Non-Human.

Constraint 1: Using Unity Engine.

Constraint 2: One Input Only.

Made by Digital Deer
